connector.description: An object that contains the connector configuration.

fields.description: An object containing the connector fields. To create a case without a connector, specify null. If you want to omit any individual field, specify null as its value.

caseId.description: The case identifier for Swimlane connectors.

category.description: The category of the incident for ServiceNow ITSM and ServiceNow SecOps connectors.

destIp.description: A comma-separated list of destination IPs for ServiceNow SecOps connectors.

impact.description: The effect an incident had on business for ServiceNow ITSM connectors.

issueType.description: The type of issue for Jira connectors.

issueTypes.description: The type of incident for IBM Resilient connectors.

malwareHash.description: A comma-separated list of malware hashes for ServiceNow SecOps connectors.

malwareUrl.description: A comma-separated list of malware URLs for ServiceNow SecOps connectors.

parent.description: The key of the parent issue, when the issue type is sub-task for Jira connectors.

priority.description: The priority of the issue for Jira and ServiceNow SecOps connectors.

severity.description: The severity of the incident for ServiceNow ITSM connectors.

severityCode.description: The severity code of the incident for IBM Resilient connectors.

sourceIp.description: A comma-separated list of source IPs for ServiceNow SecOps connectors.

subcategory.description: The subcategory of the incident for ServiceNow ITSM connectors.

urgency.description: The extent to which the incident resolution can be delayed for ServiceNow ITSM connectors.

id.description: The identifier for the connector. To create a case without a connector, use `none`.

name.description: The name of the connector. To create a case without a connector, use `none`.

settings.description: An object that contains the case settings.

syncAlerts.description: Turns alert syncing on or off.

tags.description: The words and phrases that help categorize cases. It can be an empty array.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: The cases that you want to removed. All non-ASCII characters must be URL encoded.

fields.description: An object containing the connector fields. To create a case without a connector, specify null. If you want to omit any individual field, specify null as its value.

severity.description: The severity of the incident for ServiceNow ITSM connectors.

severityCode.description: The severity code of the incident for IBM Resilient connectors.

id.description: The identifier for the connector. To create a case without a connector, use `none`.

name.description: The name of the connector. To create a case without a connector, use `none`.

settings.description: An object that contains the case settings.

syncAlerts.description: Turns alert syncing on or off.

tags.description: The words and phrases that help categorize cases.

version.description: The current version of the case.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated subset of cases.
Retrieves information about connectors. In particular, only the connectors that are supported for use in cases are returned.
Returns the number of cases that are open, closed, and in progress.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: A filter to limit the retrieved case statistics to a specific set of applications. If this parameter is omitted, the response contains all cases that the user has access to read.

get.description: Aggregates and returns a list of case tags.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: A filter to limit the retrieved case statistics to a specific set of applications. If this parameter is omitted, the response contains tags from all cases that the user has access to read.

parameters.name: includeComments
parameters.description: Determines whether case comments are returned.

post.description: Adds a comment to a case.

alertId.description: The alert identifier. It is required only when `type` is `alert`. This functionality is in technical preview and may be changed or removed in a future release. Elastic will apply best effort to fix any issues, but features in technical preview are not subject to the support SLA of official GA features.

comment.description: The new comment. It is required only when `type` is `user`.

index.description: The alert index. It is required only when `type` is `alert`. This functionality is in technical preview and may be changed or removed in a future release. Elastic will apply best effort to fix any issues, but features in technical preview are not subject to the support SLA of official GA features.

rule.description: The rule that is associated with the alert.  It is required only when type is alert. This functionality is in technical preview and may be changed or removed in a future release. Elastic will apply best effort to fix any issues, but features in technical preview are not subject to the support SLA of official GA features.

0.value:
{

  "type": "user",

  "owner": "cases",

  "comment": "That is nothing - Ethan Hunt answered a targeted
    social media campaign promoting phishy pension schemes to IMF
    operatives."

}

patch.description: Updates a comment in a case.

alertId.description: The alert identifier. It is required only when `type` is `alert`. This functionality is in technical preview and may be changed or removed in a future release. Elastic will apply best effort to fix any issues, but features in technical preview are not subject to the support SLA of official GA features.

comment.description: The new comment. It is required only when `type` is `user`.

index.description: The alert index. It is required only when `type` is `alert`. This functionality is in technical preview and may be changed or removed in a future release. Elastic will apply best effort to fix any issues, but features in technical preview are not subject to the support SLA of official GA features.

rule.description: The rule that is associated with the alert.  It is required only when type is alert. This functionality is in technical preview and may be changed or removed in a future release. Elastic will apply best effort to fix any issues, but features in technical preview are not subject to the support SLA of official GA features.

version.description: The current version of the comment.

delete.description: Deletes all comments from a case.

get.description: Retrieves all the comments from a case.

delete.description: Deletes a comment from a case.

get.description: Retrieves a comment from a case.
Returns all user activity for the specified case.

default_search_operator.name: defaultSearchOperator
default_search_operator.description: The default operator to use for the simple_query_string.

fields.name: fields
fields.description: The fields in the entity to return in the response.

from.name: from
from.description: Returns only cases that were created after a specific date. The date must be specified as a KQL data range or date match expression.

owner.name: owner
owner.description: A filter to limit the retrieved cases to a specific set of applications. Valid values are:cases, observability, and securitySolution. If this parameter is omitted, the response contains all cases that the user has access to read.

per_page.name: perPage
per_page.description: The number of rules to return per page.

reporters.name: reporters
reporters.description: Filters the returned cases by the user name of the reporter.

search.name: search
search.description: An Elasticsearch simple_query_string query that filters the objects in the response.

search_fields.name: searchFields
search_fields.description: The fields to perform the simple_query_string parsed query against.

sort_field.name: sortField
sort_field.description: Determines which field is used to sort the results.

status.name: status
status.description: Filters the returned cases by state.

tags.name: tags
tags.description: Filters the returned cases by tags.

to.name: to
to.description: Returns only cases that were created before a specific date. The date must be specified as a KQL data range or date match expression.
